name: Deflecting Edge
effect: This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon. Prevent the next 3 combat damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
effect_raw: This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon. Prevent the next 3 combat damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.

rule.description: Deflecting Edge can only prevent combat damage, which is damage dealt by attacks.
The damage prevented does not need to be from one source. E.g. three different sources each dealing 1 combat damage each can all be prevented in the same turn.

flavor: When masterfully used, a sword can deflect any attack with minimal force.

result_editions.flavor: "Ha! Are you even trying to hit me?"

editions.flavor: "Ha! Are you even trying to hit me?"

name: Frostsworn Paladin
effect: Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) On Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card and put a buff counter on Frostsworn Paladin.
effect_raw:
Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)
On Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card and put a buff counter on Frostsworn Paladin.

result_editions.effect: Intercept On Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card and put a buff counter on Frostsworn Paladin.
result_editions.flavor: The Frostsworn stand as Lumina's sacred guard.

editions.effect: Intercept On Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card and put a buff counter on Frostsworn Paladin.
editions.flavor: The Frostsworn stand as Lumina's sacred guard.

name: Nullifying Lantern
effect: Cards in graveyards are norm element. (They are not any other element.)
effect_raw: Cards in graveyards are norm element. (They are not any other element.)
flavor: Cleansing impurities of the soul, these lanterns are indispensable for those seeking enlightenment.

result_editions.effect: Cards in graveyards are norm element.
result_editions.flavor: Some say the ancestral mausoleums of Pendragon are cursed—only traversable with the Corhazi's light.

editions.effect: Cards in graveyards are norm element.
editions.flavor: Some say the ancestral mausoleums of Pendragon are cursed—only traversable with the Corhazi's light.

name: Scavenging Raccoon
effect: On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
effect_raw: On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor: Looters have conditioned these diligent creatures to scavenge the battlefield for any source of glint or glitter in exchange for a treat.

result_editions.flavor: With a nose for trash and an eye for treasure, these relentless scavengers will stop at nothing to fill their hoards with trinkets and baubles.

editions.flavor: With a nose for trash and an eye for treasure, these relentless scavengers will stop at nothing to fill their hoards with trinkets and baubles.

name: Imperious Highlander
effect: On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.
effect_raw: On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X power until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.
flavor: Against all odds and against an insurmountable front, there can be only one answer.

result_editions.flavor: "You indolent wretches will be cut down by my ascendant mastery of the blade."

editions.flavor: "You indolent wretches will be cut down by my ascendant mastery of the blade."

name: Inspiring Call
effect: This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn. Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.
effect_raw:
This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn.
Allies you control get +1 power until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.
flavor:
"Aesans, rally to me! Camelot will not fall!" 
— Lorraine Allard

result_editions.flavor: Valiant cries fortify wills and strengthen resolves, but have opposite effects in foes.
Valiant cries fortify wills and strengthen resolves, but have opposite effects in foes.

editions.flavor: War cannot be won alone.
Valiant cries fortify wills and strengthen resolves, but have opposite effects in foes.
Valiant cries fortify wills and strengthen resolves, but have opposite effects in foes.

name: Hasty Messenger
effect: On Attack: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: On Attack: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: “War is upon us. Spread the word!”

result_editions.flavor: The duty of delivering time-sensitive parcels is given to the fleet of foot.

editions.flavor: "The emperor is dead! The throne sits empty!"
The duty of delivering time-sensitive parcels is given to the fleet of foot.

name: Tide Diviner
effect: On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. (LV refers to your champion's level.)
effect_raw: On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. (LV refers to your champion's level.)
flavor: Reading the ebb and flow of the moon's sway grants insight into the currents of fate.

result_editions.effect: On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
result_editions.flavor: Those cast away by the torrents of fate find shelter in fortunes foretold.

editions.effect: On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
editions.flavor: Those cast away by the torrents of fate find shelter in fortunes foretold.

name: Aithne, Spirit of Fire
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

name: Morrigan, Lost Spirit
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

name: Prismatic Spirit
effect: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
flavor: A beautiful dance of color and the enmeshment of elements make manifest its prismatic brilliance.

name: Gate of Alterity
effect: : Put Gate of Alterity on the bottom of your champion's lineage then choose a class. Gate of Alterity gains "Inherited Effect: This object is the chosen class in addition to its other classes."
effect_raw: REST: Put Gate of Alterity on the bottom of your champion's lineage then choose a class. Gate of Alterity gains "Inherited Effect: This object is the chosen class in addition to its other classes."
flavor: A gate powered by The Grand Archive itself. It grants special privileges to champions that pass through it.

name: Orb of Regret
effect: Banish Orb of Regret: Shuffle up to three cards from your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
effect_raw: Banish Orb of Regret: Shuffle up to three cards from your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
flavor: No being is truly bound to their fate, at least not when the will of the divine can be swayed.

result_editions.flavor: Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.
Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.

editions.flavor: Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.
Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.

name: Orb of Glitter
effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, glimpse 1. Banish Orb of Glitter: Draw a card.
effect_raw:
At the beginning of your recollection phase, glimpse 1.
Banish Orb of Glitter: Draw a card.
flavor: These orbs adorn many studies of fortune-tellers. In the hands of a diviner, it is truly a tool of great power.

result_editions.flavor: The fleeting iridescences that wavers in the orb shows both what could be and what could have been.
The fleeting iridescences that wavers in the orb shows both what could be and what could have been.

editions.flavor: The fleeting iridescences that wavers in the orb shows both what could be and what could have been.
The fleeting iridescences that wavers in the orb shows both what could be and what could have been.

name: Gwendolyn, Spirit of Wind
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: "For thee, I beseech a swift victory."

name: Ordinary Bear
effect: Pride 2 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 2 or higher.) Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Pride 2 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 2 or higher.)
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Tithe Proclamation
effect: On Enter: Draw a card. Each player can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Draw a card.
Each player can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: Players can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game. -> Each player can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game.

flavor: Wealth can only be amassed up to a certain point before the church of Aesa takes an interest.

result_editions.flavor: All beings stand equal underneath the light of grace.
All beings stand equal underneath the light of grace.

editions.flavor: All beings stand equal underneath the light of grace.
All beings stand equal underneath the light of grace.

name: Fast Cure
effect: If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, recover 4. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.) Floating Memory
effect_raw:
If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, recover 4. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)
Floating Memory
flavor: A brief respite in dire times may give enough focus to birth a plan.

result_editions.flavor:
The saint's sacred blessing defies death's grasp.
Now, charge forward once again into glorious war.

The saint's sacred blessing defies death's grasp.
Now, charge forward once again into glorious war.

editions.flavor:
The saint's sacred blessing defies death's grasp.
Now, charge forward once again into glorious war.

Now, charge forward once again into glorious war.

name: Creative Shock
effect: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Class Bonus: If a fire element card was discarded, you may choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Class Bonus: If a fire element card was discarded, you may choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: Once Creative Shock starts to resolve, players can't respond to its effects. If a player wants to respond to the potential 2 damage Creative Shock can deal, it must be responded to before Creative Shock starts resolving (before its controller draws two cards).

result_editions.effect: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Class Bonus: If a fire element card was discarded, you may choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it.
result_editions.flavor: A caster's will can be expressed by the frenetic dancing of fleeting flames.

result_editions.effect: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Class Bonus: If a fire element card was discarded, you may choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it.
result_editions.flavor: A caster's will can be expressed by the frenetic dancing of fleeting flames.

editions.flavor: "Let me show you my true power."

name: Sabrina, Spirit of Water
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: "Peace and calm in the ocean's comforting hold."
